entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
